org.mitre.synthea.world.agents.behaviors

Interface IPayerFinder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PayerFinderBestRates, PayerFinderRandom

    public interface IPayerFinder
    Find a particular provider by service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Payer chooseRandomlyFromList(java.util.List<Payer> options, RandomNumberGenerator rand)
      Choose a random payer from a list of payers.
      Payer find(java.util.List<Payer> payers, Person person, HealthRecord.EncounterType service, long time)
      Find a payer that meets the person's and simulation's requirements.
      static boolean meetsBasicRequirements(Payer payer, Person person, HealthRecord.EncounterType service, long time)
      Determine whether or not the given payer meets the person's basic requirements.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        Payer find(java.util.List<Payer> payers,
           Person person,
           HealthRecord.EncounterType service,
           long time)
        Find a payer that meets the person's and simulation's requirements.
        Parameters:
        payers - The list of eligible payers (determined by state currently).
        person - The patient who requires a payer.
        service - The service required.
        time - The date/time within the simulated world, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Service provider or null if none is available.

      • meetsBasicRequirements

        static boolean meetsBasicRequirements(Payer payer,
                                      Person person,
                                      HealthRecord.EncounterType service,
                                      long time)
        Determine whether or not the given payer meets the person's basic requirements.
        Parameters:
        payer - The payer to check.
        person - The patient who requires a payer.
        service - The service required.
        time - The date/time within the simulated world, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        if the payer meets the basic requirements.

      • chooseRandomlyFromList

        default Payer chooseRandomlyFromList(java.util.List<Payer> options,
                                     RandomNumberGenerator rand)
        Choose a random payer from a list of payers.
        Parameters:
        options - the list of acceptable payer options that the person can recieve.
        Returns:
        a random payer from the given list of options.
